name: Siren's Call
text:
Target the nearest non-immune enemy unit in range not adjacent to you; move that unit up to 2 spaces along the shortest valid path towards you.
May repeat once.

name: Backlash
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: **This turn:** After you discard a card for any reason, perform the primary action on an attack card in your discard, if able.
_(First complete the action causing the discard.)_

name: Counter Swing
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: **This turn:** After you discard a card for any reason, perform the primary action on an attack card in your discard, if able.

name: Dangerous Slash
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
+1 ::attack:: Attack for every enemy unit adjacent to you.
_(Count all enemy units, including the target.)_

name: Deadly Swipe
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
+2 ::attack:: Attack for every enemy unit adjacent to you.

name: Lethal Spin
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
+3 ::attack:: Attack for every enemy unit adjacent to you.

name: Long Thrust
text: Target a unit in range, not adjacent to you.

name: Rapid Thrusts
text:
Target a unit in range, not adjacent to you.
After the attack: If you are adjacent to an enemy hero, may repeat once on a different target unit.

name: Charming Aura
text: **This round:** Enemy melee minions in radius count as friendly when calculating the defense totals.

name: Aura of Controle
text: **This round:** Enemy ranged and melee minions in radius count as friendly when calculating the defense totals.

name: Aura of Domination
text: **This round:** All enemy minions in radius, including the immune ones, count as friendly when calculating the defense totals.

name: Constrict
text: **Next turn**: Enemy heroes adjacent to you cannot move, except when performing a movement action on a gold card or a red card.

name: Deadly Embrace
text: **Next turn**: Enemy heroes adjacent to you cannot move, except when performing a movement action on a gold card.

name: Stone Gaze
text:
**This turn**: The nearest enemy heroes in radius are immune, cannot perform a movement action, and count as terrain.
_(Will affect multiple heroes if they are at the same distance,)_

name: Petrifying Stare
text: **This turn**: The nearest enemy heroes in radius are immune, cannot perform a movement action, and count as terrain.

name: Turn into Statues
text: **This turn**: Enemy heroes in radius are immune, cannot perform a movement action, and count as terrain.

name: Fresh Converts
text: If you are adjacent to a minion, you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Devoted Followers
text: If you are adjacent to a minion, you may retrieve a discarded card and **This turn:** You are immune to attack actions.

name: Metamorphosis
text: You may move through obstacles. Before you perform an action, one enemy hero adjacent to you discards a card, if able.
